text:
Notable clients and engineering organisations served through MTDCNC include:

- Mazak
- DMG Mori
- Haas
- FANUC
- XYZ Machine Tools
- Starrag
- Hurco
- Siemens
- Autodesk
- Renishaw
- Heidenhain
- Ward Hi-Tech
- Engineering Technology Group

These relationships represent significant exposure to advanced manufacturing technologies, automation systems, robotics, and CNC engineering environments.
